minions.name: Leprechaun
minions.description: Ongoing: After another player plays a minion here with less power than this minion's power, destroy it (resolve its ability first)

minions.name: Brownie
minions.description: Ongoing: After another player plays a card that affects this minion, that player discards two random cards

minions.name: Gnome
minions.description: You may destroy a minion on this base with power less than the number of minions you have here

minions.name: Gremlin
minions.description: Ongoing: After this minion is destroyed, draw a card and each other player discards a random card

actions.name: Disenchant
actions.description: Destroy an action that has been played on a minion or base

actions.name: Enshrouding Mist
actions.description: Play on a base. Ongoing: On your turn, you may play an extra minion here

actions.name: Block the Path
actions.description: Play on a base and name a faction. Ongoing: Minions of that faction cannot be played here

actions.name: Flame Trap
actions.description: Play on a base. Ongoing: After another player plays a minion here, destroy it (resolve its ability first) and this card

actions.name: Hideout
actions.description: Play on a base. Ongoing: If another player's action would affect your minions here, destroy this card and the action does not affect your minions

actions.name: Mark of Sleep
actions.description: Choose a player. That player cannot play actions on his or her next turn

actions.name: Pay the Piper
actions.description: Play on a base. Ongoing: After another player plays a minion here, that player discards a card

actions.name: Take the Shinies
actions.description: Each other player discards two random cards
